translations: v．瞥见，一瞥：短暂地、快速地看一眼某物或某人。

sentences.sentence: Ms. Scales recalls her first sighting of a wild seahorse as "like glimpsing a unicorn trotting through my garden".
sentences.translation: 斯盖尔斯女士回忆起自己第一次看到野生海马的情景，就像“瞥见一只独角兽在我的花园里小跑”。

sentences.sentence: Glimpsing the life in the past that had faded and crumbled, I have to move on.
sentences.translation: 回头看着我已经凋零和崩塌的生活，我必须前进，过去是靠不住的。

sentences.sentence: But a good local guide will improve your chances of glimpsing some magnificent beasts.
sentences.translation: 找个有经验的向导会增加你见到这些惊人动物的机会。
